text: @GarethTrewick @severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWalesandSW @CanalRiverTrust @fishmigration @LIFEprogramme @HeritageFundM_E @kiergroup They were originally going to be round in shape but realised a square design created better resting spaces for the fish!
